document.full_text: shelvin mack and the butler bulldogs are back in the n.c.a.a. final after coming a bounce away from winning it all last year.
document.title: butler 70, virginia commonwealth 62: mack leads butler back to national title game
lines_and_colors: shelvin mack and the butler bulldogs are back in the n.c.a.a. final after coming a bounce away from winning it all last year.
